title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message:
Hi,
I have above board , original issue was loading osx half way shutdown. some times not turning at all. but now no chime no video but all the power rails are present including ppvcore.

also
all_sys_pwrgd is 3.3v
pm_pch_pwrk  is 3.3v

So greatful if you can give any any clue.

Thank you verymuch for supporting.
Regards

Don

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message: just to add about background no liquid dmg or power issue.

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message: Also when i connect a mouse it lights up.

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message:
Try PRAM reset.
Look at mouse light if restarts, if chime is not present.

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message: The usual 00045 problem. I have no idea what it is at this time.

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message: Hi Duke, Thank you for your reply. Hope you will find the cause soon:)

title: 820-00045 "12" RETINA NO CHIME NO VIDEO,  PRESENT PPVCORE 1.7V
message: Hi Duke, Did you find any solution for this no chime no video issue? Thanks.
